title: How many short-term course certificates are equivalent to a degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, When it comes to success there are no shortcuts. Here it’s the same! Avoid shortcut of doing short courses in comparison to degree courses. This is required to get some good positio in life. If you are looking for short term courses in the place of doing some degree course, you are going wrong somewhere. You definitely need to have a degree instead of certificates or LOAs of the short term courses. You can do a short term course parallel to your degree course that can be beneficial. But not doing a degree course might land you in a problem. There might be a situation where you can be placed due to certification in some course but the eligibility criteria would definitely require you to be some degree holder ( B.Tech , B.Com, BE, BCA etc.). Degree would be the first step to show your qualification and that would make you eligible to get any good job in your field. All the best! :)

You’ve ample time to devote for short-term courses. MORAL OF THE STORY : NO SHORT-TERM COURSE IS TANTAMOUNT TO GRADUATION DO UPVOTE IF YOU FEEL SATISFIESD GOOD LUCK REGARDS —- C.SOLANK
